name: Super Easy Vegan Oreo Ice Cream
description: This no-churnÂ vegan oreo ice cream with peanut butter and peanuts is perfect to celebrate summer! It's so decadent, extremely yummy, and super easy to make!
recipeIngredient: 4  ripe bananas, cut into slices and frozen for at least 12 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Put the frozen bananas, the chunky peanut butter, and three of the oreo cookies in a blender and process until smooth. If needed add a little almond or other plant-based milk to make it easier for the blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the frozen bananas, the chunky peanut butter, and three of the oreo cookies in a blender and process until smooth. If needed add a little almond or other plant-based milk to make it easier for the blender.

recipeInstructions.text: When the nice cream is smooth add three more oreo cookies and pulse for a about three seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: When the nice cream is smooth add three more oreo cookies and pulse for a about three seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the nice cream into two cups and top if off with the remaining two oreos (crumbled), the peanuts, and some banana slices. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the nice cream into two cups and top if off with the remaining two oreos (crumbled), the peanuts, and some banana slices. Enjoy!
